## goup-util screenshot

Screenshot support not available in this build

### Synopsis

Screenshot support requires CGO and is not available in this build.

To build with screenshot support:
  CGO_ENABLED=1 go build -tags screenshot .

Or use the task:
  task build:with-screenshot

```
goup-util screenshot [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for screenshot
```
